attributes.action: socialmedia to verify all accounts to stop fakecyberbullying accounts being made
attributes.additional_details: Someone i know is being targeted on social media and noone will do anything about it. An account on fb has been reported over and over and apparently it doesn't violate there terms... even though they have put death threats on there wall and the account is still allowed even though it is a fake. accounts should be verified and teenagers should have limited use and if you break the rules or law you should be banned from the site.. lets try to tackle cyberbullying and fake accounts
attributes.background: There are alot of fake accounts on facebook etc and nothing gets done about it. i believe social media should check these accounts properly and put a verified sticker next to people who have proved there age and name. i also believe they need to look into these accounts properly when we report them

rejection.details:
This petition is calling on social media companies, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action. 

You could start a new petition asking for Parliament to change the law, to require all social media companies to verify people's identity.

You may also wish to sign this petition: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200697

Threatening someone's life is a crime. If you believe a crime has been committed you should contact the police.
